import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react' import Rahul from './Img/Rahul.png' import top2 from './Img/top2.png' import top3 from './Img/top3.png' import top4 from './Img/top4.png' import searchgif from './Vedio/search.gif' function AllPlacement() { const list = [ { name: 'Rahul Thapliyal', imgurl: Rahul, Companyname: 'MicroSoft', packages: '43.3', duration: '2016-20' }, { name: 'Taranjeet Kaur', imgurl: top2, Companyname: 'Adobe', packages: '43.17', duration: '2016-20' }, { name: 'Riya Verma', imgurl: top3, Companyname: 'Adobe', packages: '40', duration: '2015-19' }, { name: 'Himakshi Salhotra', imgurl: top4, Companyname: 'Adobe', packages: '40', duration: '2015-19' }, { name: 'Rahul Thapliyal', imgurl: Rahul, Companyname: 'MicroSoft', packages: '43.3', duration: '2016-20' }, { name: 'Taranjeet Kaur', imgurl: top2, Companyname: 'Adobe', packages: '43.17', duration: '2016-20' }, { name: 'Riya Verma', imgurl: top3, Companyname: 'Adobe', packages: '40', duration: '2015-19' }, { name: 'Himakshi Salhotra', imgurl: top4, Companyname: 'Adobe', packages: '40', duration: '2015-19' }, { name: 'Rahul Thapliyal', imgurl: Rahul, Companyname: 'MicroSoft', packages: '43.3', duration: '2016-20' }, { name: 'Taranjeet Kaur', imgurl: top2, Companyname: 'Adobe', packages: '43.17', duration: '2016-20' }, { name: 'Riya Verma', imgurl: top3, Companyname: 'Adobe', packages: '40', duration: '2015-19' }, { name: 'Himakshi Salhotra', imgurl: top4, Companyname: 'Adobe', packages: '40', duration: '2015-19' }, { name: 'Rahul Thapliyal', imgurl: Rahul, Companyname: 'MicroSoft', packages: '43.3', duration: '2016-20' }, { name: 'Taranjeet Kaur', imgurl: top2, Companyname: 'Adobe', packages: '43.17', duration: '2016-20' }, { name: 'Riya Verma', imgurl: top3, Companyname: 'Adobe', packages: '40', duration: '2015-19' }, { name: 'Himakshi Salhotra', imgurl: top4, Companyname: 'Adobe', packages: '40', duration: '2015-19' } ] const [search, setSearch] = useState(''); var count = 0; const myref = useRef(); const handlecount = (val) => { count = val; return 1; } const isEqual = (itemE, searchV) => { itemE = itemE.toUpperCase(); searchV = searchV.toUpperCase(); let searchp = searchV; if (searchp === searchV && itemE.indexOf('-') === -1) { return parseInt(itemE) >= parseInt(searchV); } let value = itemE.indexOf(searchV); console.log(value); if (value !== -1) { return true; } else { return false; } } useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []) return ( <>
Placements (Computer Science and Engineering)
{ setSearch(e.target.value) }} className='w-4/5 md:w-2/3 lg:w-1/3 m-4 p-2 text-lg rounded border-2 shadow-lg border-gray-300 focus:border-gray-400 focus:outline-none' />
{ list.map((item, i) => { return search ? ((isEqual(item.packages, search) || isEqual(item.duration, search) || isEqual(item.Companyname, search)) ? (handlecount(1)) && (

{item.name}

{item.Companyname}

A UX designer is the voice of the customer. Our job is to look beyond the business goals. We don't just experience user interface but also questions it.
) : <>) : (handlecount(0)) && (

{item.name}

{item.Companyname}

A UX designer is the voice of the customer. Our job is to look beyond the business goals. We don't just experience user interface but also questions it.
) }) }
{ count === 0 && search ?
No Pages Found!
: <> }
) } export default AllPlacement
